Text:
Soviets actually plotted (Ribbentrop-Molotov) to attack Poland and were attacked by National Socialists (their brothers in faith) much later.
It's disgusting how British "documentary" with good access to historic facts is disseminating lies repeated after NKWD propaganda machine...
"Russians expelled Germans from their lands and took Berlin"... Actually Americans had to wait for red army because of Yalta agreement (FDR gave Stalin all eastern countries for free).
